data.lyric:
[ti:Truth Hurts]
[ar:Lizzo]
[al:Truth Hurts]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Truth Hurts (Explicit) - Lizzo
[00:07.04]Why men great 'til they gotta be great
[00:10.78]Woo
[00:11.70]I just took a DNA test turns out I'm 100 that b***h
[00:16.64]Even when I'm crying crazy
[00:18.20]Yeah I got boy problems that's the human in me
[00:21.20]Bling bling then I solve 'em that's the goddess in me
[00:23.81]You coulda had a bad b***h non-committal
[00:26.96]Help you with your career just a little
[00:29.84]You're 'posed to hold me down but you're holding me back
[00:33.28]And that's the sound of me not calling you back
[00:37.01]Why men great 'til they gotta be great
[00:40.05]Don't text me tell it straight to my face
[00:43.09]Best friend sat me down in the salon chair
[00:46.26]Shampoo press get you out of my hair
[00:49.27]Fresh photos with the bomb lighting
[00:52.26]New man on the Minnesota Vikings
[00:55.27]Truth hurts needed something more exciting
[00:58.28]Bom bom bi dom bi dum bum bay
[01:00.67]You tried to break my heart
[01:02.25]Oh that breaks my heart
[01:03.83]That you thought you ever had it
[01:05.24]No you ain't from the start
[01:06.77]Hey I'm glad you're back with your b***h
[01:08.45]I mean who would wanna hide this
[01:09.87]I will never ever ever ever ever be your side chick
[01:13.00]I put the sing in single
[01:15.43]Ain't worried 'bout a ring on my finger
[01:18.39]So you can tell your friend shoot
[01:20.86]Your shot when you see 'em
[01:22.89]It's OK he already in my DMs
[01:26.03]Why men great 'til they gotta be great
[01:28.77]Don't text me tell it straight to my face
[01:31.76]Best friend sat me down in the salon chair
[01:34.76]Shampoo press get you out of my hair
[01:37.85]Fresh photos with the bomb lighting
[01:40.93]New man on the Minnesota Vikings
[01:43.94]Truth hurts needed something more exciting
[01:46.87]Bom bom bi bom bi dum bum bay
[01:49.88]I'ma hit you back in a minute
[01:52.62]I don't play tag b***h I been it
[01:55.61]We don't f**k with lies we don't do goodbyes
[01:58.76]We just keep it pushing like aye yi yi
[02:01.99]I'ma hit you back in a minute
[02:04.74]I don't play tag b***h I been it
[02:07.78]We don't f**k with lies we don't do goodbyes
[02:10.91]We just keep it pushing like aye yi yi
[02:14.35]Why men great 'til they gotta be great
[02:17.31]Don't text me tell it straight to my face
[02:20.35]Best friend sat me down in the salon chair
[02:23.41]Shampoo press get you out of my hair
[02:26.38]Fresh photos with the bomb lighting
[02:29.42]New man on the Minnesota Vikings
[02:32.44]Truth hurts needed something more exciting
[02:35.46]Bom bom bi bom bi dum bum bay
[02:40.73]Eith the bomb lighting
[02:43.56]Minnesota Vikings
[02:46.02]Aiii yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Truth Hurts]
[ar:Lizzo]
[al:Truth Hurts]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:07.04]为什么男人看似强大 实则毫无用处
[00:10.78]//
[00:11.70]我刚做了DNA检测 结果显示我是个彻彻底底的傻瓜
[00:16.64]就算伤心得嚎啕大哭
[00:18.20]我还是会跟男生纠缠不清 这是我的本性
[00:21.20]我能拿下他们 这是我的魅力
[00:23.81]你可以找个性感的女人 不用负责
[00:26.96]她可以给你的事业提供一点帮助
[00:29.84]你本来应该和我并肩作战的 可你却拖了我的后腿
[00:33.28]我绝对不会再挽留你了
[00:37.01]为什么男人看似强大 实则毫无用处
[00:40.05]别再给我发短信了 有话当面说
[00:43.09]我的好朋友带我去了美发沙龙
[00:46.26]护发 按摩 把你彻底忘记
[00:49.27]在灯光下拍了很多新照片
[00:52.26]新交往了明尼苏达州维京队里的一个球员
[00:55.27]真相让人心痛 需要一点刺激的东西
[00:58.28]//
[01:00.67]你企图让我彻底心碎
[01:02.25]真令人寒心
[01:03.83]你竟然认为我从未爱过你
[01:05.24]不 你从一开始就错了
[01:06.77]你要回去找你的前女友 很好
[01:08.45]我是说 感情的事本来就很难隐瞒
[01:09.87]我永远也不会做你的小三
[01:13.00]我把这段伤心往事写成一首歌
[01:15.43]就算单身 也不会为婚姻大事着急
[01:18.39]所以 等你见到你的朋友 你可以跟他们说
[01:20.86]把握机会 勇敢追求真爱
[01:22.89]他已经和我勾搭上了
[01:26.03]为什么男人看似强大 实则毫无用处
[01:28.77]别再给我发短信了 有话当面说
[01:31.76]我的好朋友带我去了美发沙龙
[01:34.76]护发 按摩 把你彻底忘记
[01:37.85]在灯光下拍了很多新照片
[01:40.93]新交往了明尼苏达州维京队里的一个球员
[01:43.94]真相让人心痛 需要一点刺激的东西
[01:46.87]//
[01:49.88]我马上就回你电话
[01:52.62]我不是故意不理你的 女孩 刚才真的有事
[01:55.61]我们都别骗自己了 我们不能分开
[01:58.76]我们都在努力维持这段感情
[02:01.99]我马上就回你电话
[02:04.74]我不是故意不理你的 女孩 刚才真的有事
[02:07.78]我们都别骗自己了 我们不能分开
[02:10.91]我们都在努力维持这段感情
[02:14.35]为什么男人看似强大 实则毫无用处
[02:17.31]别再给我发短信了 有话当面说
[02:20.35]我的好朋友带我去了美发沙龙
[02:23.41]护发 按摩 把你彻底忘记
[02:26.38]在灯光下拍了很多新照片
[02:29.42]新交往了明尼苏达州维京队里的一个球员
[02:32.44]真相让人心痛 需要一点刺激的东西
[02:35.46]//
[02:40.73]灯光下
[02:43.56]明尼苏达州维京队
[02:46.02]//
